name: DAPVerse
description:
Enter the DAPverse.

  • Multiplayer metaverse spanning multiple game, so far Catching Broccoli is only one integrated.
  • Fishing
  • NFTs
  • Sponsorship from all major game jam tech providers
  • Terms of services
  • Lag
  • Runs in the cloud

Server

You need to host your own server for DAPVerse. If you discover you can not fish, this is because you are not connected to a server.

Why?

Made within 48 hours during Global Game Jam 2022 for theme Duality.

  • Jesper Tingvall - Programming
  • Sara Erenius - Server deployment & cloud infrastructure
  • Maikha - 3D & 2D art
